sub_domain: Factions & Families (Minor or Major Families depending on setting)

faction_profile.name: 산동악가 (Shandong Ak Family / 山東岳家)

landmarks: Daming Lake (대명호 / 大明湖) - A scenic retreat for training.
Yellow River (황하 / 黃河) - Symbol of their rough and grand spirit.
location.meta_note: Historically, General Yue Fei was from Henan, not Shandong. In Korean Wuxia, this is accepted as a fictional adaptation or explained as descendants moving to Shandong.

heritage.ancestor: General Yue Fei (악비 / 岳飛) - The God of War and symbol of loyalty.
heritage.ideology: Serve the country with utmost loyalty (Jingchungboguk / 盡忠報國).

status.tier: Often depicted as a prestigous martial family, sometimes rivalling the Five Great Families.
status.specialty: Spear Arts (Chang-beop) - Rare among noble families who usually prefer swords.

personality: Values honor and loyalty above life.
Often acts as a bridge between the Murim and the Imperial Military.

combat_style.summary: Military Spear Arts designed for war.
combat_style.tactics: Linear, destructive, and grand movements suitable for the battlefield rather than duels.
combat_style.vibe: Overwhelming momentum like the Yellow River.

contradiction.description: Their loyalty to the Imperial Court can lead to conflicts with the independent spirit of the Murim world.

list.name: 사십구식악가창법 (49-Style Ak Family Spear)
list.description: The foundation of their martial arts, derived from military drills.

list.name: 구십육수광풍창 (96-Hand Mad Wind Spear)
list.description: Fast and chaotic attacks like a storm.

list.name: 청룡천강창 (Blue Dragon Heavenly Descent Spear)
list.description: A striking technique that descends from above with heavy force.

related_arts: Eagle Claw Fist (응조권) - Legend says Yue Fei created this.
Eight Section Brocade (팔단금) - Health exercise attributed to Yue Fei.

narrative_role: The 'Lawful Good' ally who is stubborn but reliable.
A character who questions the protagonist's morality based on 'Loyalty to the State'.
Rivals to the Hebei Peng Family (Blade vs Spear, Strength vs Discipline).
Guardians of the Shandong region against pirates or corrupt officials.
